articles.title: Sticky Situation: Critical Antenna on ESA's Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer Fails To Deploy - SciTechDaily
articles.description: ESA's Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer (Juice) has encountered a deployment issue with its Radar for Icy Moons Exploration (RIME) antenna. The issue, potentially caused by a stuck pin, is being addressed by ESA's mission control teams with various strategies, inclu…
articles.content:
ByEuropean Space Agency (ESA)April 29, 2023
Illustration of the JUICE spacecraft at Jupiter. The Radar for Icy Moons Exploration (RIME) antenna on ESAs Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer (Juice) spacecraft … [+4975 chars]
